response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is worth significantly more than its actual market value. This product has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional benefits and experiences tailored to enhance your daily life. Given its unique features and the quality it embodies, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it today at a special introductory price of $150. This is an exceptional value considering the benefits you'll receive. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 150}
